title: Ep 49: Half Baked Ideas
description:
Today's proceedings:  A waiter refuses to take this mother's order, a fiance refuses to sign any kind of prenup, a husband gets caught in a shameful act, and a boyfriend has some explaining to do after missing the garbage can. Also we get a sneak peak into Christian's process for coming up with segment ideas.

Get your Sheesh Merch here! http://etsy.com/shop/Judgiespodcast

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod

Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod

Music by: Iván  https://open.spotify.com/artist/0dlYkMquTDLwn0Wh3A8U4s?si=5ayT43JfRVux2qrKpOkvpg

Logo/Designs by:  https://www.youtube.com/user/lilwillis121


Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-judgies/support

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
